Title: Disenchanted
Description:
Where does hope come from? It’s probably hard-wired, the result of an evolutionary process.
A creature with hope is less likely to give up and more likely to raise offspring, thus passing down an ability to find resilience in the face of change.
Disenchanted …

Title: Chimpanzees pick up communication styles from their moms, not their dads
Description:
A new study finds that chimpanzee babies learn vocal and visual communication patterns from their mothers.
The findings may shed light on the way human babies learn from those close to them.

Title: Old Fiddler's Convention is pushing 90 and keeping mountain music alive
Description:
The Old Fiddler's Convention in Galax, Va., features mostly amateur musicians playing Bluegrass and Old Time music.
At age 89, it's the oldest continuous competition of its kind in the U.S.

Title: Amid growing 'scandal' of elder homelessness, health care groups aim to help
Description: The housing crisis is requiring creative scrambling and new partnerships from health care organizations to keep older patients out of expensive nursing homes as homelessness grows.

Title: A Ukrainian weapons maker is building a new unjammable drone with a 100-kilometer reach. It says 'the war has changed.'

Title: Five Texas school districts at risk of a state takeover after ratings’ release
Description: The state can take control of a school district if at least one of its campuses receives a failing grade five years in a row.
